overview:
Monty Munford has more than 15 yearsâ€™ experience in mobile, digital media, web and journalism, and returned to the UK in 2010 after living in India for two years.

In that time he consulted clients such as Paramount Digital Entertainment in LA to deliver its content to an Indian mobile audience. He also landed speaking parts in two big-budget Bollywood movies that were released in Q1 2011.

He currently writes a regular tech/mobile column for the Telegraph, contributes regulartly to TechCrunch in the US and advises companies such as Wapple on content strategy.

He is @montymunford on Twitter and writes an influential blog at www.montysoutlook.com
